summary: An FBI Crisis Intake report documenting a call from a former employee of Jeffrey Epstein who worked for him in 2003. The caller describes Epstein's grooming behavior, offers of travel, and observations at his Palm Beach home, but states she was not assaulted and was unaware of illegal activity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the child sex trafficking investigation. The caller was a former employee who describes his grooming behavior and travel offers.

persons.name: Unnamed Caller
persons.context: A woman who worked for Epstein in 2003 via a temp agency. She called the FBI to report her experiences, including Epstein's grooming attempts and observations at his Palm Beach home.

connections.description: The caller was placed as a temporary employee in Epstein's New York Strategy Group in 2003.
Epstein offered to fly the caller to his island and to take her to see her father in New Mexico, demonstrating a grooming pattern beyond a professional relationship.

events.title: Caller's Employment with Epstein
events.description: The unnamed caller was placed into Jeffrey Epstein's New York Strategy Group by a temporary staffing agency to cover for a woman on maternity leave.

events.title: Visit to Epstein's Palm Beach Home
events.description: Epstein offered to take the caller to see her father in New Mexico, but they first went to his Palm Beach, FL home. Her flight was canceled, and she returned to New York after a few days.

events.title: FBI Crisis Intake Call
events.description: The unnamed caller contacted the FBI's National Threat Operations Center to report her previous employment and experiences with Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: New York Strategy Group (Epstein's office, location unspecified)
keyFacts: A former temporary employee of Jeffrey Epstein contacted the FBI in July 2019, providing information about her experiences in 2003.
The employee stated Epstein attempted to groom her by offering to fly her to his private island and take her on a trip to see her father.
During a stay at Epstein's Palm Beach home, the caller observed two other females who claimed to be 19 and 20 years old.
The caller explicitly stated she was not assaulted and did not witness or hear about any illegal activity during her time with Epstein.
The caller mentioned Epstein was involved with a modeling agency.
